definition: abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]
Caltrop or puncture vine (Tribulus terrestris)/to thatch (a roof)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Fitzgerald attributes the depravity of the modern dream to wealth and privilege.
sentences.chinese: 菲茨傑拉德把現在美國夢的墮落歸過與財富與特權。

sentences.english: Lacking modern lab techniques, Fitzgerald must use deductive reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 沒有現代的實驗技術，菲茨傑拉德必須運用演繹推理。

sentences.english: Apartment buildings always will be more energy-efficient than a free-standing home, Fitzgerald said.
sentences.chinese: 菲茨傑拉德認爲，公寓大樓的能源效益比獨棟屋更高。

sentences.english: But the sally advocated by Fitz Gerald was necessary.
sentences.chinese: 然而菲茨傑拉德提出的突圍計劃仍是必不可少。
